metadata.title: CVE-2024-48063 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In PyTorch <=2.4.1, the RemoteModule has Deserialization RCE. NOTE: this isdisputed by multiple parties because this is intended behavior in PyTorchdistributed computing.

criterions.comment: pytorch package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
